title: All of my account information was lost when I changed my name
body:
My account information was all lost when I changed my name, and I am now back to level 1. 
On an old post, I found someone had said they just had to change their region, mine was correct so I don't think that's the problem.
I would just really like to know if I could recover that account considering I spent money on it.
It would really be a shame if I lost my account. 
I think it won't be a problem just as long as I get the RP I paid for.
So please if you have any ideas on how to fix it please tell me.

replies.body:
Hey there,

Because this is an Account-related issue, your best bet in receiving assistance in recovering your account is to submit a [Support Ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) over to Riot Support. Make sure to provide accurate information about your account in order to verify that you are indeed the owner of the account and speed up the verification process.

The average response time of Support Tickets is 24-48 hours but may take longer depending on the volume of tickets and the severity of the issue.

Hey Wafful Rin,

I'm sorry to hear about your issues; we definitely do not want people's progress to disappear. HeyItzSteve is correct, account-related issues is best solved by contacting my colleagues through the [Support Site](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). With that said--in my experience--the majority of "my account has been reduced to Summoner Level 1 (or lower than it was before)" cases tend to be because someone has multiple League of Legends accounts and has logged into the secondary hasn't-been-touched-in-a-long-while account.

You can quickly check if this is the case by using the Forgot Username page here: https://recovery.riotgames.com/en/forgot-username?region=NA1

You'll receive an email with the accounts currently associated with your email address. If you're still having issues, reach out to my colleagues and they'll investigate further.
Now I have the same issue, and I’ve submitted the ticket, I hope I can get my account back.
